channel.title: CVE Feed for Trellix -- Trellix IPS Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trellix -- Trellix IPS Manager

item.title: CVE-2022-3340|2024-08-03T01:07:06.562Z -- trellix -- trellix%20ips%20manager
item.description: XML External Entity (XXE) vulnerability in Trellix IPS Manager prior to 10.1 M8 allows a remote authenticated administrator to perform XXE attack in the administrator interface part of the interface, which allows a saved XML configuration file to be imported.
